title: Pardon WTF? No BE from disenchants
body: On 3 of my different accounts I have disenchanted champions and have not got any BE from them, Please fix this it is bs and really makes me mad that a company worth billions can fuck up this bad honestly riot get your shit together.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to track down if it's a visual bug, delay, or non-redemption.
